snippet: Although Maria Sharapova, unlike Sara Errani, is a global figure, the meeting on Saturday will be the first French Open final for both of them.
abstract: Maria Sharapova and Sara Errani are preparing to face each other in their first French Open final for both of them.
lead_paragraph: Although Maria Sharapova, unlike Sara Errani, is a global figure, the meeting on Saturday will be the first French Open final for both of them.

headline.seo: Errani and Sharapova Advance to French Open Final
headline.main: Errani and Sharapova Advance to Final
headline.print_headline: Contrasting Players, Sharapova and Errani, in Final
